content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Science Pack Production Line (around position 8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Input inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at (8.5, 13.5) producing automation science packs
- Output inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5) containing 2 automation science packs
- Connected belt system for materials transport

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex 1 (around position -28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Output chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing 28 iron plates and 10 copper plates

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex 2 (around position -18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Output chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing 66 iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup (around position 41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Output chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing 217 coal
- Inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected pipe systems for water and steam
- Electricity network connecting multiple entities

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Verify that items exist in the target chest before attempting extraction
- Check if production line is actually producing the items you're trying to extract
- Monitor assembling machine status to ensure it has all required ingredients

### Errors related to missing fuel
- Keep track of coal inventory and refuel before completely running out
- Implement a fuel monitoring system to maintain minimum coal levels
- Consider setting up automated coal delivery system for critical machines

### Production bottlenecks
- Ensure assembling machines have consistent supply of all required ingredients
- Monitor input/output ratios to prevent resource starvation
- Check if inserters are properly configured to move materials efficiently

### Assembling machine resource shortages
- Ensure consistent supply of copper plates and iron gear wheels
- Verify that input inserters are properly placing materials into assembling machines
- Monitor input chest inventory levels to maintain production flow
